title: Universal Integration Guide
subtitle: WhatsApp Business API – Complete step-by-step guide
content:
Guide Objective

This guide helps any company, even without technical knowledge, to correctly integrate with the official WhatsApp Business API.

What is WhatsApp Business API

The WhatsApp Business API is Meta’s official solution for integrating business systems with WhatsApp.

Prerequisites

  • Legally registered company
  • Valid official documents
  • Corporate email
  • Exclusive phone number for API

What is an interaction

One interaction equals one user message followed by one system response.
faq:
Can I use my personal WhatsApp?
No.

Are message templates mandatory?
Yes.

Are there costs?
Yes, defined by Meta.
termo: The client acknowledges responsibility for proper use and compliance with Meta policies.
